main event: A civilian reported observing a red, silvery object the size of a basketball that was very bright in San Antonio, Texas on August 12, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 25 to 28 minutes and the object remained stationary throughout., The object was described as very bright and its size was compared to that of a basketball., A balloon was reportedly released from San Antonio Airport at the time of the sighting., The sighting was classified as a ground-visual observation., No unusual sightings were detected on radar at that time.
sighted object: a red, silvery object the size of a basketball
